item.title: Bookcase Layout Document
item.description: Bookcase layout is useful for creating another viewpoint of list contents. This layout can only be used on section page (_index.md). Configuration --- type: 'bookcase' --- Specify type in front-matter will change the template lookup order. bookcase_list_sections List subsections. --- bookcase_list_sections: true --- default: true bookcase_list_pages List pages. --- bookcase_list_pages: true --- default: true Resouces Configuration These parameters are located in bookcase item’s resource. For example: . ├── books.md <- config is located in here!
